logger.info("**************************************************************************")
logger.info("\t MDM - CATEGORY  - OMT -PRIM - CAT - Starting with below parameters")
logger.info("*************************************************************************")
logger.info("\t SOURCE_MERCH_CATEGORY_NAME_LAKE_PATH : {0}".format(SOURCE_MERCH_CATEGORY_NAME_LAKE_PATH))
logger.info("\t STAGE_MERCH_CATEGORY_NAME_PATH : {0}".format(STAGE_MERCH_CATEGORY_NAME_PATH))
logger.info("\t TARGET_MERCH_CATEGORY_NAME_PATH : {0}".format(TARGET_MERCH_CATEGORY_NAME_PATH))
logger.info("\t OPCO_LST : {0}".format(OPCO_LST))
logger.info("\t VAL_CNT_THRESHOLD : {0}".format(VAL_CNT_THRESHOLD))
logger.info("**************************************************************************")

from pyspark.sql.types import StructType, StructField, ShortType, StringType,TimestampType, IntegerType, LongType, DecimalType, BooleanType, DateType, ArrayType

STAGE_MERCH_CATEGORY_NAME_SCHEMA = StructType([
    StructField("prim_cat_id", LongType(), True),
    StructField("cat_name_tx", StringType(), False),
    StructField("type_cd", StringType(), False),
    StructField("actv_cd", StringType(), False),
    StructField("audt_cr_dt_tm", TimestampType(), False),
    StructField("audt_cr_user_cd", StringType(), False),
    StructField("audt_upd_dt_tm", TimestampType(), True),
    StructField("audt_upd_user_cd", StringType(), False)
    ])

logger.debug("\t schema-defination : Defined the schema for catalog_prod:omt_prim_cat.\n {0}".format(STAGE_MERCH_CATEGORY_NAME_SCHEMA))

from delta.tables import DeltaTable
from pyspark.sql.functions import current_timestamp, lit

if(DeltaTable.isDeltaTable(spark, BASE_ADLS_CONN_STR + STAGE_MERCH_CATEGORY_NAME_PATH)):
    mssparkutils.fs.rm(BASE_ADLS_CONN_STR + STAGE_MERCH_CATEGORY_NAME_PATH, recurse = True)
    logger.info("\t Purging data from STG container {0}".format(STAGE_MERCH_CATEGORY_NAME_PATH))



df_prod_ctr_name_stage = spark \
    .read \
    .format("parquet") \
    .schema(STAGE_MERCH_CATEGORY_NAME_SCHEMA) \
    .load(BASE_ADLS_CONN_STR + SOURCE_MERCH_CATEGORY_NAME_LAKE_PATH) \
    .withColumnRenamed("audt_cr_dt_tm", "src_audt_cr_dt_tm") \
    .withColumnRenamed("audt_cr_user_cd", "src_audt_cr_user_cd") \
    .withColumnRenamed("audt_upd_dt_tm", "src_audt_upd_dt_tm") \
    .withColumnRenamed("audt_upd_user_cd", "src_audt_upd_user_cd") \
    .withColumn("tgt_audt_cr_dt_tm", current_timestamp()) \
    .withColumn("tgt_audt_upd_dt_tm", current_timestamp()) \
    .withColumn("tgt_audt_cr_user_cd", lit('usr-data-integration')) \
    .withColumn("tgt_audt_upd_user_cd", lit('usr-data-integration')) 
  


df_prod_ctr_name_stage \
    .sort(KEY_COL)\
    .write \
    .format("delta") \
    .option("inferSchema","True")\
    .mode("overwrite") \
    .save(BASE_ADLS_CONN_STR + STAGE_MERCH_CATEGORY_NAME_PATH)  

logger.info("\t stg-load: Created STG data from lake source. \n LAKE = {0} \n STG = {1} \n CNT = {2}".format(SOURCE_MERCH_CATEGORY_NAME_LAKE_PATH, STAGE_MERCH_CATEGORY_NAME_PATH, df_prod_ctr_name_stage.count()))

from delta.tables import DeltaTable

def load_master_data(df_stage, path, opco):
    df_stage\
           .sort(KEY_COL) \
           .write \
           .option("mergeSchema", "True") \
           .mode("overwrite") \
           .format("delta") \
           .save(path)
    logger.info("\t CATALOG_PROD:OMT_PRIM_CAT Master data overwrite.OPCO = {0}, Count={1}".format(opco, df_stage.count()))
    
def apply_cdc():
    logger.info("\t Delta master load")
    df_prod_ctr_name_master= spark \
                        .read \
                        .format("delta") \
                        .load(BASE_ADLS_CONN_STR + TARGET_MERCH_CATEGORY_NAME_PATH.format(opco = opco)) 
    logger.info("\t CATALOG_PROD:OMT_PRIM_CAT loaded from master. OPCO = {0}, Count={1}".format(opco, df_prod_ctr_name_master.count()))
    df_prod_ctr_name_master.createOrReplaceTempView('tbl_prod_ctr_name_mstr')
    df_prod_ctr_name_stage.createOrReplaceTempView('tbl_prod_ctr_name_stage')
    spark.sql(
        """
        MERGE INTO tbl_prod_ctr_name_mstr
        USING tbl_prod_ctr_name_stage
        ON tbl_prod_ctr_name_mstr.prim_cat_id = tbl_prod_ctr_name_stage.prim_cat_id
        WHEN MATCHED THEN
            UPDATE SET *
        WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN
            INSERT *
        """
        )
    logger.info("\t CATALOG_PROD:OMT_PRIM_CAT merged delta records to main file. OPCO = {0}, Count={1}".format(opco, df_prod_ctr_name_stage.count()))
def init():
        logger.info('\t First Time Master Load')
        load_master_data(df_prod_ctr_name_stage,BASE_ADLS_CONN_STR + TARGET_MERCH_CATEGORY_NAME_PATH.format(opco = opco),opco)

##############################

# FULL LOAD / DELTA LOAD

##############################
for opco in OPCO_LST:
    logger.info("\t Processing MASTER for CTR OMT_PRIM_CAT - OPCO={0}".format(opco))
    if(DeltaTable.isDeltaTable(spark, BASE_ADLS_CONN_STR + TARGET_MERCH_CATEGORY_NAME_PATH.format(opco = opco)) == False):
        init()
    else:
        apply_cdc()
